channel.title: Escape From Society - Officially Thomass
channel.description:
Watch on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/0N4mSyVIgWOlgzJZ5sEuzI?si=eO0GJfWWTE2ZW7Kl2X6rsg&context=spotify%3Atrack%3A0N4mSyVIgWOlgzJZ5sEuzI Watch on YouTube: https://youtu.be/YUGUAB5LRpU All my songs are now on Spotify, Apple Music, SoundCloud, and YouTube!!!
The wait is over, Escape from Society is the Title Track of my upcoming album. So far, I have released 3 of 14 songs from the album.
Track 1: Track 2: I Will Escape When I Can Track 3: Track 4: Track 5: Track 6: Track 7: Track 8: Track 9: Track 10: Time to Leave Track 11: Escape From Society Track 12: Track 13: Track 14:
